about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Slimes, skeletons, ghosts—these little monsters, often bullied in other games, have come together to settle in a newly established village. Tired of endless battles, they dream of enjoying a peaceful pastoral life. As the village manager, you'll guide them in farming, building, fishing, logging, mining, and more. Optimize workflows and increase efficiency to transform your village from ruins to prosperity.

Key Features

  • Diverse Village Activities
    Violence is forbidden in this village, but you can grow crops, gather resources, construct buildings, trade goods, and meet the daily development needs of the village. Raise your prosperity level and create a perfect home for these monsters.

  • Dice-Based Rules
    All village tasks are governed by DND-style dice rolls. The outcome of these rolls determines whether tasks succeed and how quickly progress is made.

  • Desktop System Interaction
    This village isn’t isolated from the outside world. It refers to your operating system as the “otherworld.” Files from this “otherworld” can grow crops, and even the cursor is considered a villager! (When interacting with your system’s files, only file paths are read unless explicitly specified otherwise.)

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (OpenGL 3.0 support)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU, 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card

short_description: Welcome to a unique non-combat monster village management game! Here, you'll manage quirky villagers to farm, build, trade, fish, and uncover their stories. Through strategic planning, watch your village flourish as you unlock secrets and special events.
